summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of West 76th Street, from 3rd Avenue Northwest to 8th Avenue Northwest; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by paving and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 9543 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
